title: I keep getting an error message when trying to download emails on Windows 11 device. "Connection to Server mail.besttelecom.net.au was reset".
content: For the past two weeks, since my IP provider renewed security certificates, I have not been able to send or receive emails in Thunderbird. I can access my emails fine using one of my android devises through Thunderbird, biut my Windows 11 devices refuse to co-operate. I deleted certificates in the hope that Thunderbird would download and attach new certificates, but this has not happened either. I have tried changing ports and security TLS. I can however, access my mail.besttelecom.net.au emails using outlook. I have been using Thunderbird since it's first appearance and prefer it to any other email manager.I have heaps of data stored in it which I access regularly, so I would prefer not going to another email manager.

title: NEW MESSAGE tab not workinh since last update
content:
Since I first started using FIREFOX and THUNDERBIRD many years ago they have been virtually trouble free, but after the most recent update of THUNDERBIRD the NEW MESSAGE tab has stopped working. I have not, and never have, changed any SETTINGS and I checked my default email address as suggested, and it is exactly as it always has been. The various HELP options that have come up on internet searches have not worked, so I would appreciate some 'plain English' step by step instructions on how the problem can be fixed.

I really appreciate Mozilla enabling me to avoid Google etc as much as possible, and the AI assist on internet searches with has been really helpful. At MOZILLA's suggestion, I am using Privacy Badger and Ad Nauseum, but don't really understand what they do. Thank you, Alan Upritchard. alan.upritchard@xtra.co.nz, an email address I have had for something like 40 years.

title: welke smtp server
content:
Ik heb 3 accounts in thunderbird, dus 3 smtp server geconfigureerd bij installatie. Als ik nu naar accountinstellingen ga zie ik bij het overzicht van serverinstellingen bij elke account alleen de definitie van de imap server. Onderaan de accounts is er het item "outgoing server (SMTP)" : hier zie ik 3 servers staan maar geen accounts, wel gebruiksnamen in de details. Er kan een "standaard" server geselecteerd worden. Ik heb gelezen dat de standaard server gebruikt wordt als er geen andere server ter beschikking is. Welke smtp server wordt er gebruikt als ik een mail verstuur vanaf een bepaald account adres?

title: Emails missing from search results when clicking 'Show results as list'
content:
I perform a search using the top search bar looking for a word i.e. 'Messages mentioning:' The search result shows it has found 30 emails. I click on 'Show results as list' and the new tab opens but the list only shows only 26 of the 30. When I compare the 30 with the list of 26, I see that the missing four are consecutive in the date sequence. Going back to the tab that displays the 30, and clicking on the individual messages, I find that the four troublesome messages result in 'No message found'. Going directly to the folder where I know the messages are stored, I can open the four troublesome messages OK.

What should I try next to analyse the problem further?

140.1.1esr (64-bit)

title: Kan Thunderbird niet meer opstarten in Mac OS
content: Beste Mozilla-gebruikers, Ik kan Thunderbird niet meer opstarten op mijn iMac (MacOS Catalina - versie 10.15.7). Tot nu toe nooit problemen gehad maar nu plotseling wel. Het icoontje Thunderbird onderaan in mijn dock-balk blijft bij het willen opstarten permanent 'dansen' en doet verder niets. Er zit niets anders op dan maar af te sluiten met het commando 'forceer stop'. Ook de zogenaamde 'probleemoplossingsmodus' om add-ons uit te schakelen en te controleren op een eventueel corrupt profiel (opstarten met ingedrukte toets 'alt'), doet het niet. Herinstalleren van Thunderbird werkt al evenmin. Icoontje 'Thunderbird' blijft maar zijn macaber dansje uitvoeren :-( Wie weet raad waarvoor alvast veel dank?
creator: roeland.theuwissen

title: Blocco dei "contenuti remoti"
content:
Ciao e grazie anticipatamente per il supporto, sto usando Thunderbid 142.0 su W11 e credo ci sia un comportamento inatteso. Uso Thunderbird su una casella GMAIL con PGP: ho creato le mie chiavi private e pubbliche, che sono riconosciute da PROTON (servizio di mail crittografata che uso da web o client), infatti le mail verso PROTON sono correttamente decriptate. Ovviamente anche PROTON ha le chiavi PGP e scambia mail regolarmente con GMAIL, che Thunderbird decripta correttamente. Problema: se metto una foto nel messaggio email che mando da PROTON a GMAIL, Thunderbird quando la riceve mi dice che blocca i contenuti remoti e non mi permette di scaricarli (manca il bottone delle opzioni), ma me la ritrovo come allegato alla mail che posso aprire (vedi Thunderbird.png). Ho provato a mettere la eccezione dell'indirizzo email nelle impostazioni di Privacy e sicurezza dell'account GMAIL, ma segnala lo stesso il problema. Se mando da GMAIL a PROTON una mail con una immagine, in PROTON vedo un segnalibro di "oggetto mancante" (quindi non viene mandata) -- e non arriva NULLA, nemmeno come allegato (vedi PROTON.png). Come ultimo tentativi ho anche abilitato "permetti contenuti remoti dentro i messaggi" dalle impostazioni globali, ma Thunderbird continua a dirmi che "ha bloccato i contenuti remoti".

C'è qualche spiegazione? può essere che la crittografia PGP abbia problemi con le foto? (nota: Thunderbird mi dice che è tutto OK -2 lucchetti con spunta verde- nel bottone "OpenPGP").

Grazie mille anticipatamente del supporto!

Beppe
creator: giuseppe.miotti

title: Calendar sync to/from BT email only works for full day events
content: Since a problem with my BT email account (hacked) and its restoration I only seem able to sync between the two calendars when the diary entry is ticked as a whole day event. This appears to happen in both directions. In other words try to log an event with start and end times and it does not get synced to the other diary (and visa versa). I also suspect that the times of the two systems are not in sync but cannot find where to check them both. I assume that they both access W11 for the data. Any thoughts much appreciated.
creator: frank.noton

title: Digitally signing  Issue
content:
Been using thunderbird for at least 20 years, and learn to live with the bugs and wait for the next release waiting and expecting the issues of the previous release were solved in the next one.

I've been using S/MIME certificates for many years without problem. I've recently installed a new certificate wich is correctly installed in my personal repository expiring in 2027. Since version 141 this certificates shows as selected, but is not used. Updated to release 142 ... but the problem persists.

I'm attaching a screen capture were shows the error message and the Developers Console showing the exitcode when trying to send a mail with digitally signed.

Please also note (i don´t know if this is related or not) that when y check the certificate in the account the hexadecimal ID of the certificate is not shown. If I clear the certificate and select it again it is shown in this screen. Attached to this you can find a capture of what mentioned before.

Please let me know if more information is needed.

Thanks / Regards


Ariel Pereira
creator: apereira1970

title: What happened to Thunderbird error log?
content:
I used to troubleshoot when Thunderbird would fail to download new messages by looking at the last successfully downloaded email. But I can't find the error log. I'm pretty sure older versions allowed you to see the error log under Tools. But it isn't there and developer section is not helpful. I have tons of message filters going into folders so it is impossible to identify the last successful email download.

How am I to fix this issue if there is no longer a way to see failed email downloads via the error log?

I wasn't happy with the UI changes burying the menus into the hamburger on the side, but figured I could live with it. Not sure the benefit, maybe it looks cleaner? But removing functionality at the same time is really NOT helpful.

Anyone have any ideas how to find the error log or find the email causing Thunderbird to stop seeing downloadable emails?
